announcements: üî• Parent-Teacher conferences are THIS WEEK - let's show them our fierce academic prowess!
üèÄ Basketball season starts Monday - come support our prowling Panthers!
üìö Book fair continues through Friday - feed your mind with knowledge!

sixth.subject: Mathematics
sixth.content: Panthers are DOMINATING fractions this week! We're converting mixed numbers like champions and solving word problems that would make other schools tremble!

sixth.subject: Science
sixth.content: Ecosystem exploration continues! Our Panthers are building food webs that show the fierce interdependence of nature.

sixth.subject: English Language Arts
sixth.content: Poetry unit in full swing! Students are crafting verses with the intensity of a panther's roar.

sixth.subject: Social Studies
sixth.content: Ancient civilizations unit - learning how great empires rose with panther-like determination!

seventh.subject: Pre-Algebra
seventh.content: Equations and inequalities are NO MATCH for our 7th grade Panthers! They're solving multi-step problems with ruthless precision!

seventh.subject: Life Science
seventh.content: Cell structure and function - our Panthers are microscopic masters understanding the building blocks of life!

seventh.subject: Literature
seventh.content: Character analysis deep dive! Students are dissecting protagonists with the focus of a hunting panther.

seventh.subject: Geography
seventh.content: Climate zones and their impact on civilizations - perfect for understanding our fierce Alaskan environment!

eighth.subject: Algebra I
eighth.content: Linear functions have met their match! Our 8th grade Panthers are graphing slopes and intercepts like mathematical predators!

eighth.subject: Physical Science
eighth.content: Forces and motion unit - understanding the physics behind every panther's powerful leap!

eighth.subject: Advanced Literature
eighth.content: Analyzing themes in classic literature with the depth and intensity that would make Shakespeare proud!

eighth.subject: U.S. History
eighth.content: Revolutionary War - studying how determination and fierce spirit can change the world!

achievements.accomplishment: Perfect score on state math assessment - CRUSHED every problem!
Regional wrestling champion - DOMINATED the competition!
First place in art contest with fierce panther sculpture!
Student council president - leading with panther pride!
Honor roll for the third consecutive semester!

events.title: Parent-Teacher Conferences
events.description: Come see how your Panthers are prowling toward success! Sign up for time slots in the main office.

events.title: Basketball Season Opener
events.description: Our Panthers hit the court! Come roar your support as we face the Copper River Wolverines!

events.title: Book Fair
events.description: Feed your mind! Browse hundreds of books and support our literacy programs.

events.title: Science Fair Project Proposals Due
events.description: Time to show your scientific prowess! Proposals for the spring science fair are due.
